name: Loomed
description:
A simple 3d platformer where everytime you activate the objectives a new part of the world will appear.
You will throughout the game unlock more abilities. 

Made for Ludum Dare 45 game jam

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Space (Hold) - Rocketboots

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Escape - Pause

Possible bugs

- Game sometimes can't run on integrated graphics

Twitter: @ThatRumme
